title: Help riot....
body:
I was in champ select when I chose Janna and then I dc'd from my internet or something, so I went to get something to eat (dinner) and came back to see I had waits, which I didnt think I deserved. I then checked my match history and which is when I find out that the game still went through even though I dc'd in champ select.....
Please riot

replies.body:
Well, the client doesn't actively check for if everyone is connected. If you disconnected, but not in a direct way, it would have presumed you're just lagging a bit, and go through with the game anyway.

Not too sure what can be done is such a situation.
